issue.title: Bitcoin PR tracking
issue.body: The main purpose of this issue is to keep track of Pull Requests on Bitcoin since version 0.19.1 identifying those which make a porting LitecoinZ.

issue.title: [Refactor] Update RNG code from upstream
issue.body:
This is a collection of upstream PRs that have been backported to bring our RNG (`src/random`) code more up-to-date. The following upstream PRs have been included here:

- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12742
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14624 
  - some of this had already been merged previously
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14955
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15250
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15224
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15324
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15296
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15512
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16878
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17151
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17191
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13236
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13314
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17169
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17270
  -  omitted last commit as our testing framework doesn't support it currently
  - omitted https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17270/commits/64e1e022cedf6776c5dffd488ca2e766adca5dc3, to be pulled in after our time utility is updated in a separate PR
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17573
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17507
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17670
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17527
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14127
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21486
